definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

sentences.english: Jobic took his bar of iron and broke open the other door.
sentences.chinese: 若比用他的鐵棒撬開了另一個門。

sentences.english: The Kungfu monks of China, testing physical extremes with rods of iron.
sentences.chinese: 中國的功夫和尚正在用鐵棒測試身體的極限。
想象一下鐵棒從頭頂射過。

sentences.english: We were all astonished to see him force a bar hooking.
sentences.chinese: 看見他用手把一根鐵棒掰成鉤形，我們都驚呆了。

sentences.english: He spent hours filing the iron rod in two.
sentences.chinese: 他花了幾個小時把那條鐵棒銼成兩截。

sentences.english: It's hard to bend an iron bar.
After several rounds with the rat and the bar, Watson then brought out the rat on its own.
sentences.chinese: 在多輪“小鼠和鐵棒”的實驗後，華生單獨給出小鼠。

sentences.english: A rusty iron rod projected mournfully from one of the window ledges.
sentences.chinese: 一個窗架上突出一根生鏽的鐵棒，真是滿目淒涼。

sentences.english: Back gull bent like an iron bar slowly. The house
sentences.chinese: 像一根鐵棒一樣彎曲着，緩慢地飛行。

sentences.english: And due to an explosion, an iron rod passed through his head like so.
sentences.chinese: 因爲一次爆炸，一個鐵棒像這樣穿過了他的頭。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the diterpene alkaloids from the roots of Aconitum flavum Hand.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究伏毛鐵棒錘根部的二萜生物鹼成分。

sentences.english: He is swinging a club with the hand.
sentences.chinese: 他把一根鐵棒銼成兩截。

sentences.english: Owners out of a fastening screw from the Cong Juli thick iron bar.
sentences.chinese: 車主從從車裏抽出一根緊固螺絲的粗鐵棒。

sentences.english: The rod itself weighed thirteen pounds.
They forged pieces for a wrought-iron railing.
sentences.chinese: 他們將生鐵塊鍛造成熟鐵棒。

definition: lit. to punch and kick (idiom); to beat up/fig. determined to sort out a problem
to dig into/to cut a mine into
lit. dumb as a wooden chicken (idiom); fig. dumbstruck
